item.title: Understanding and Managing Mark of the Web in .NET
item.description: What is Mark of the Web? Mark of the Web (MOTW) is a Windows security feature that protects users from potentially unsafe files downloaded from the internet. When you download a file, Windows automatically adds a special metadata tag indicating the file originated from an untrusted source and may contain harmful content. Windows components such as Microsoft Edge and Windows Explorer use MOTW to determineâ€¦ Link to article: https://www.meziantou.net/understanding-and-managing-mark-of-the-web-in-dotnet.htm?utm_medium=social&utm_source=syndication
